title: UK Finance Minister Rishi Sunak's Wife's Financial Affairs Impact His Reputation, Ratings Drop For The First - Indiatimes.com
content: UK Finance Minister Rishi Sunak's Wife's Financial Affairs Impact His Reputation, Ratings Drop For The First  Indiatimes.com
description: UK's finance minster, or Chancellor of the Exchequer Rishi Sunak's favorability rating turned negative for the first time, sinking below that of Prime Minister Boris Johnson, reported Bloomberg.
